title: You Have Been Disconnected
body:
Hi Everyone,
Today I decided to start a ranked game.
1. Queue was fine
2. Champ select was fine
3. Got into loading screen, displayed "You Have Been Disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again."
4. Attempted to reconnect a dozen times, logged out a dozen times, nothing.
Can anyone help me?

replies.body:
Used to have the same problem.
Used LAN wires to connect through internet.
Everything is okay until now :)

It sounds like your network was able to transition to a few of our services until it got to our game server.  This could happen with an unstable connection or some kind of block, but there are a few tricks to help.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to work this out and get back in game.  Let me know if you have any questions!
